actionConfiguration.body:
SELECT customer_collection_declation.shop_id, customer_collection_declation.shop_name, customer_collection_declation_log.received_amount, customer_collection_declation_log.proof_of_amount_received, customer_collection_declation_log.receive_date, customer_collection_declation_log.created_at FROM customer_collection_declation_log 
join customer_collection_declation
on customer_collection_declation.id=customer_collection_declation_log.customer_collection_declation_id
where customer_collection_declation_id={{collection_declaration_tbl.triggeredRow.id}}
